tit.j: 阿波エクスプレス京都号
tit.cmt: 文字体訂正しました。コンマ削除しました。-go補足しました。

sen.j: 阿波エクスプレス京都号（あわエクスプレス きょうとごう）は、京都市、乙訓郡大山崎町、高槻市と鳴門市、徳島市を結ぶ昼行高速バスである。
sen.e: The Awa Express Bus, the Kyoto, is the daytime Express bus running from Kyoto City, Otokuni District Oyamasaki-cho, Takatsuki City to Naruto City, Tokushima City.
The Awa Express Bus Kyoto-go is the daytime express bus running from Kyoto City - Oyamasaki-cho, Otokuni District - Takatsuki City - Naruto City - Tokushima City.
sen.cmt: 文字体訂正しました。コンマ削除しました。-go補足しました。express小文字にしました。ハイフンで接続しました。Oyamasaki-cho, Otokuni Districtに訂正しました。
sen.e: The Awa Express Bus Kyoto-go is the daytime express bus running from Kyoto City - Oyamasaki-cho, Otokuni District - Takatsuki City - Naruto City - Tokushima City.

sen.j: 全便座席指定制のため、乗車には予約が必要。
sen.e: Because all buses operated for this route have reserved seatings, it is required to reserve a seat in advance for boarding.
Because all buses operated for this route have reserved seating, it is required to reserve a seat in advance for boarding.
Because all buses operated for this route have reserved seating, it is required to reserve a seat in advance for boarding.

sen.j: 関西～徳島間の高速バスは、JR系と徳島バス・私鉄系とは同じ行き先でも完全に別立てで運行されているが、この京都行きのみは両系統の共同運行となっている。
sen.e: While thoses buses running between Kansai Region and Tokushima Prefecture are individually operated by JR (Japan Railroad) and private bus companies, (suh as the Tokushima Bus Co. Ltd.) this Awa Express Bus, the Kyoto, is jointly operated by both parties.

While these buses running between Kansai Region and Tokushima Prefecture are individually operated by JR (Japan Railroad) and private bus companies, (suh as the Tokushima Bus Co., Ltd.) this Awa Express Bus Kyoto-go is jointly operated by both parties.
sen.cmt: theseスペル訂正しました。文字体訂正しました。コンマ削除しました。-go補足しました。
sen.e: While these buses running between Kansai Region and Tokushima Prefecture are individually operated by JR (Japan Railroad) and private bus companies, (suh as the Tokushima Bus Co., Ltd.) this Awa Express Bus Kyoto-go is jointly operated by both parties.

sen.j: このバスの愛称は、西日本JRバス、JR四国バス、京阪バス、本四海峡バスの4社が阿波エクスプレス京都号（あわエクスプレスきょうとごう）に統一しているが、徳島バスのみエディ号（徳島バスの高速バスに共通してつけられる愛称であり、『阿波エクスプレス京都号』は路線名として使用されている）である。
sen.e: Although the public nickname of this express bus is unified as the Awa Express Bus, the Kyoto among those four companies jointly operating this bus route, (West JR Bus Company, JR Shikoku Bus Company, the Keihan Bus Co. Ltd., and the Honshi Kaikyo Bus Co. Ltd.) only the bus of this route operated by the Tokushima Bus Co. Ltd. is named as the Eddy. (This name is the common public nickname given to all the express buses operated by the Tokushima Bus, while the "Awa Express Bus, the Kyoto" is the official name for this company, too)

Although the public nickname of this express bus is unified as the Awa Express Bus Kyoto-go among those four companies jointly operating this bus route, (West JR Bus Company, JR Shikoku Bus Company, the Keihan Bus Co., Ltd., and the Honshi Kaikyo Bus Co., Ltd.) only the bus of this route operated by the Tokushima Bus Co., Ltd. is named as the Eddy (this name is the common public nickname given to all the express buses operated by the Tokushima Bus, while the "Awa Express Bus Kyoto-go" is the official name for this company, too.)
sen.cmt: 文字体訂正しました。コンマ削除しました。-go補足しました。Co., Ltd.コンマ補足しました。ピリオド位置を訂正しました。the 小文字にしました。
sen.e: Although the public nickname of this express bus is unified as the Awa Express Bus Kyoto-go among those four companies jointly operating this bus route, (West JR Bus Company, JR Shikoku Bus Company, the Keihan Bus Co., Ltd., and the Honshi Kaikyo Bus Co., Ltd.) only the bus of this route operated by the Tokushima Bus Co., Ltd. is named as the Eddy (this name is the common public nickname given to all the express buses operated by the Tokushima Bus, while the "Awa Express Bus Kyoto-go" is the official name for this company, too.)

sen.j: 三角印の向きが進行方向を示す。
sen.e: The triangle shape indicates the direction of the bus route.
The triangle shape indicates the direction of the bus route.
The triangle shape indicates the direction of the bus route.
The round shape indicates the final stop/destination of the bus route.

sen.j: 1日7往復（西日本JR2往復、JR四国・徳島各1.5往復、京阪・本四各1往復）。
sen.e: 7 round-trips in a day (the West JR Bus for 2 round-trips, the JR Shikoku Bus and the Tokushima Bus for 1.5 round-trips, and the Keihan Bus and the Honshi Kaikyo Bus for 1 round-trip)
7 round-trips in a day (the West JR Bus for 2 round-trips, the JR Shikoku Bus and the Tokushima Bus for 1.5 round-trips, and the Keihan Bus and the Honshi Kaikyo Bus for 1 round-trip)
7 round-trips in a day (the West JR Bus for 2 round-trips, the JR Shikoku Bus and the Tokushima Bus for 1.5 round-trips, and the Keihan Bus and the Honshi Kaikyo Bus for 1 round-trip)

sen.j: 真夜中を跨いで運行する便はない。
sen.e: There is no bus operating after midnight.
There is no bus operating after midnight.
There is no bus operating after midnight.

sen.e: The operation of this bus route has started (6 round-trips operation in a day).

sen.j: - 本四海峡バスの参入により1往復増便、1日7往復となる。
sen.e: The Honshi Kaikyo Bus joined for the operation with 1 round-trip operation in a day, therefore the number of the operation for this bus route became 7 round-trip operations in a day.
The Honshi Kaikyo Bus joined for the operation with 1 round-trip operation in a day, therefore the number of the operation for this bus route became 7 round-trip operations in a day.
The Honshi Kaikyo Bus joined for the operation with 1 round-trip operation in a day, therefore the number of the operation for this bus route became 7 round-trip operations in a day.

sen.j: 同時に大山崎・高槻への停車開始。
sen.e: At the same time, the revision was made to stop at Oyamazaki and Takatsuki Bus Stops.
